publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3575 Dr Jean Turner: Reality at Work in Scotland—That the Parliament continues to recognise the contribution that the voluntary sector and social economy makes to Scotland and, in particular, towards fulfilling the Closing the Opportunity Gap objectives; commends the work of organisations such as Reality at Work in Scotland, which works with local authorities and helps them to fulfil their statutory obligations, providing looked-after children with holidays, and urges the Scottish Executive to continue to press towards the practice of full cost recovery in contracting with local authorities, as well as the development of a detailed strategy to provide more stable direct funding for the voluntary sector, particularly where a strong contribution is made to Closing the Opportunity Gap objectives.Supported by: Mark Ballard*, Ms Sandra White*, Rob Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Christine Grahame*, Mike Pringle*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-3575 Reality at Work in Scotland (lodged on 15 November 2005) Chris Ballance*, Robin Harper*, Carolyn Leckie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Tommy Sheridan*, Shiona Baird*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3575 Reality at Work in Scotland (lodged on 15 November 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Murdo Fraser*, Fiona Hyslop*
